entries.title: Elon Musk’s Growing Purge of His Twitter Critics — at the Behest of the Far Right
entries.description:
The anarchist website It’s Going Down has no idea why its account was suspended. It had never tweeted about Elon Musk’s private jet.

The post Elon Musk’s Growing Purge of His Twitter Critics — at the Behest of the Far Right appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Elon Musk Is Taking Aim at Journalists. I’m One of Them.
entries.description:
The tweet — and the journalism — that got me suspended from Twitter.

The post Elon Musk Is Taking Aim at Journalists. I’m One of Them. appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: The Scorched-Earth Legal Strategy Corporations Are Using to Silence Their Critics
entries.description:
Energy and extractive industry giants are targeting environmentalists with racketeering charges.

The post The Scorched-Earth Legal Strategy Corporations Are Using to Silence Their Critics appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Journalism Source Protection Bill Gets a Last-Minute Senate Push
entries.description:
A sweeping bill blocking prosecutors from targeting journalists for their sources or seizing their data already passed the House and is within striking distance in the Senate.

The post Journalism Source Protection Bill Gets a Last-Minute Senate Push appeared first on The Intercept.
